data.message:
دي حاجة تحزن :(
 انا هابدأ استعمل Feedly.com بداله ان شاء الله
so sad :S but feedly relies on Google reader :(
it don't have its own service?

nop coz i had the chance to do some work for them. but i think from now they should start planning for something. and killing Google Reader in June is a good chance to come with an alternative. also i think google will release Google reader as an open source.
From info here from Feedly http://blog.feedly.com/2013/03/14/google-reader/ it doesn't look like Feedly rely on goolge! or what do you think?

This was a reply from feedly on a question about the dependency of Google Reader account:
 (When you connect to Google, we create a feedly account automatically which maps to that Google Account. When Google Reader is retired in July 1st, you will be able to continue to login with you Google Account, the only different is that the content you will see in your feedly will be aggregate by a feedly server call Normandy.)
